ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Back to good stuff, LOOT! and Levels!
ygData.msgSnippet: Back in the pre-kunark days I used Mystic Shielding constantly in Sol B.  As both the sonic bat and stone spider stuns are MR based.  And a stunned tank is
ygData.messageBody:
Back in the pre-kunark days I used Mystic Shielding constantly in Sol B. As
both the sonic bat and stone spider stuns are MR based. And a stunned tank
is pretty useless :) Also it is great against all those shamen mobs that
love to slow everything in sight.

Rokenn

> > Hmm I haven't messed with mystic shielding much.
>
> Got bored last night and went down to the King's Room in Runnyeye to
> reminisce a bit (remeber when BI was the rage?). There
> happened to be a
> 50+ necro in the room camping for Borxx (she needed the lens
> and nerves for
> a quest). Well sure enough, BOrxx popped, and I had had the
> good sense to
> mem Mystic Shielding. Out of about 7 or 8 casts on me, Borxx
> only got one
> to stick :o)
>
> and that's the totallity of my Mystic Shield experience ;o)~
>
> -=B=-
